properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Anti-Affinity Group.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A free-form text describing the Anti-Affinity Group purpose.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the Anti-Affinity Group (host anti-affinity is the only supported value).

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The name of the zone to deploy the Compute instance into.

properties.name: display_name
properties.description: (Required) The displayed name of the Compute instance. Note: This value is also used to set the OS' hostname during creation, so the value can only contain alphanumeric and hyphen ("-") characters; it can be changed to any character during a later update.

properties.name: template
properties.description: Deprecated (Required) The name of the Compute instance template. Only featured templates are available, use the template_id attribute instead.

properties.name: template_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the Compute instance template. Usage of the compute_template data source is recommended.

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required) The Compute instance size, e.g. Tiny, Small, Medium, Large etc.

properties.name: disk_size
properties.description: (Required) The Compute instance root disk size in GiB (at least 10).

properties.name: key_pair
properties.description: (Required) The name of the SSH key pair to be installed.

properties.name: user_data
properties.description: A cloud-init configuration. Whenever possible don't base64-encode neither gzip it yourself, as this will be automatically taken care of on your behalf by the provider.

properties.name: keyboard
properties.description: The keyboard layout configuration (at creation time only). Supported values are: de, de-ch, es, fi, fr, fr-be, fr-ch, is, it, jp, nl-be, no, pt, uk, us.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the Compute instance, e.g. Running or Stopped

properties.name: affinity_groups
properties.description: A list of Anti-Affinity Group names (at creation time only; conflicts with affinity_group_ids).

properties.name: affinity_group_ids
properties.description: A list of Anti-Affinity Group IDs (at creation time only; conflicts with affinity_groups).

properties.name: security_groups
properties.description: A list of Security Group names (conflicts with security_group_ids).

properties.name: security_group_ids
properties.description: A list of Security Group IDs (conflicts with security_groups).

properties.name: ip4
properties.description: Boolean controlling if IPv4 is enabled (only supported value is true).

properties.name: ip6
properties.description: Boolean controlling if IPv6 is enabled.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: A dictionary of tags (key/value).

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the DNS Domain.

properties.name: domain
properties.description: (Required) The name of the exoscale_domain to create the record into.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the DNS Domain Record.

properties.name: record_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of the DNS Domain Record. Supported values are: A, AAAA, ALIAS, CAA, CNAME, HINFO, MX, NAPTR, NS, POOL, SPF, SRV, SSHFP, TXT, URL.

properties.name: content
properties.description: (Required) The value of the DNS Domain Record.

properties.name: ttl
properties.description: The Time To Live of the DNS Domain Record.

properties.name: prio
properties.description: The priority of the DNS Domain Record (for types that support it).

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The name of the zone to create the Elastic IP into.

properties.name: healthcheck_mode
properties.description: The healthcheck probing mode (must be either tcp or http).

properties.name: healthcheck_port
properties.description: The healthcheck service port to probe (must be between 1 and 65535).

properties.name: healthcheck_path
properties.description: The healthcheck probe HTTP request path (must be specified in http mode).

properties.name: healthcheck_interval
properties.description: The healthcheck probing interval in seconds (must be between 5 and 300).

properties.name: healthcheck_timeout
properties.description: The time in seconds before considering a healthcheck probing failed (must be between 2 and 60).

properties.name: healthcheck_strikes_ok
properties.description: The number of successful healthcheck probes before considering the target healthy (must be between 1 and 20).

properties.name: healthcheck_strikes_fail
properties.description: The number of unsuccessful healthcheck probes before considering the target unhealthy (must be between 1 and 20).

properties.name: tags
properties.description: A dictionary of tags (key/value).

properties.name: zone
properties.description: (Required) The name of the zone to create the Private Network into.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Private Network.

properties.name: display_text
properties.description: A free-form text describing the Private Network purpose.

properties.name: network_offering
properties.description: (Required) The Private Nnetwork offering name (PrivNet is the only supported value).

properties.name: start_ip
properties.description: The first address of IP range used by the DHCP service to automatically assign. Required for managed Private Networks.

properties.name: end_ip
properties.description: The last address of the IP range used by the DHCP service. Required for managed Private Networks.

properties.name: netmask
properties.description: The netmask defining the IP network allowed for the static lease (see exoscale_nic resource). Required for managed Private Networks.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: A dictionary of tags (key/value).

properties.name: compute_id
properties.description: (Required) The Compute instance ID.

properties.name: network_id
properties.description: (Required) The Private Network ID.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: The IP address to request as static DHCP lease if the NIC is attached to a managed Private Network (see the exoscale_network resource).
The following attributes are exported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the Security Group.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A free-form text describing the Anti-Affinity Group purpose.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: A dictionary of tags (key/value).

properties.name: security_group
properties.description: (Required) The Security Group name the rule applies to.

properties.name: security_group_id
properties.description: (Required) The Security Group ID the rule applies to.

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required) The traffic direction to match (INGRESS or EGRESS).

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The network protocol to match. Supported values are: TCP, UDP, ICMP, ICMPv6, AH, ESP, GRE, IPIP and ALL.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A free-form text describing the Security Group Rule purpose.

properties.name: start_port
properties.description: /end_port - A TCP/UDP port range to match.

properties.name: icmp_type
properties.description: /icmp_code - An ICMP/ICMPv6 type/code to match.

properties.name: cidr
properties.description: A source (for ingress)/destination (for egress) IP subnet to match (conflicts with user_security_group).

properties.name: user_security_group_id
properties.description: A source (for ingress)/destination (for egress) Security Group ID to match (conflicts with cidr).

properties.name: user_security_group
properties.description: A source (for ingress)/destination (for egress) Security Group name to match (conflicts with cidr).
The following attributes are exported:

properties.name: security_group
properties.description: (Required) The Security Group name the rules apply to.

properties.name: security_group_id
properties.description: (Required) The Security Group ID the rules apply to.
egress and ingress support the following:

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The network protocol to match. Supported values are: TCP, UDP, ICMP, ICMPv6, AH, ESP, GRE, IPIP and ALL.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A free-form text describing the Security Group Rule purpose.

properties.name: ports
properties.description: A list of ports or port ranges (start_port-end_port).

properties.name: icmp_type
properties.description: /icmp_code - An ICMP/ICMPv6 type/code to match.

properties.name: cidr_list
properties.description: A list of source (for ingress)/destination (for egress) IP subnet to match (conflicts with user_security_group).

properties.name: user_security_group_list
properties.description: A source (for ingress)/destination (for egress) of the traffic identified by a security group

properties.name: compute_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the Compute instance.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: (Required) The Elastic IP address to assign.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the SSH Keypair.

properties.name: public_key
properties.description: A SSH public key that will be copied into the instances at first boot. If not provided, a SSH keypair is generated and the is saved locally (see the private_key attribute).
